code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://127.0.0.1:5000';var getAll=function getAll(library){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(library,"/getData")).then(function(response){return response.data.data;});};var createComment=function createComment(library,newObject){return axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(library,"/addData"),newObject).then(function(response){return response.data.data;});};var updateComment=function updateComment(id,newObject,library){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(library,"/updateData/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(response){return response.data.data;});};var deleteComment=function deleteComment(id,library){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(library,"/deleteData/").concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,createComment:createComment,updateComment:updateComment,deleteComment:deleteComment};
